inn1.comm: what a start that is, Shoaib jogged in and landed one on a good length outside off stump, the ball bounced sharply and angled into Gibbs and struck him on the glove

full ball on leg stump, Gibbs helps himself to an easy boundary by flicking off his pads to the square leg boundary, poor line from Shoaib, and it was a no-ball as well so Gibbs has a free hit coming up
Gibbs backs away and tries to hammer it down the ground but misses, the ball just misses off stump, it's another no-ball so Gibbs has another free hit
143 kmh, good length ball on off and middle stump, Gibbs strangely decides to just push the ball towards mid-off, it was a free hit and he could have tried to hit it anywhere

he's bowled him! Shoaib lands one on a good length and angles it into Smith who doesn't move his feet and plays with his bat away from his body, the ball hits the bottom edge of the bat and clips off stump, Shoaib strikes with his third ball and gives Pakistan an important wicket
Shoaib goes back over the wicket to the right-hander and bowls it just short of a length outside off stump, Kallis waits on the back foot and blocks
slightly fuller in length on off stump, Kallis moves forward and across and pushes the ball towards mid-off
143.4 kmh, short of a length on off and middle stump, Kallis moves on to the back foot and defends, Akhtar finishes a motley first over, two no-balls, a loose one on the pads and a wicket
starts off with a wide down leg side, Gibbs tries to flick it but doesn't make contact
that swung quite a bit, Tanvir bowled it full and angled it across the right-hander, Gibbs tried to play a cover drive but the ball swung past his outside edge
good length ball on middle and off stump, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
good length once again, pitching on middle and slanting away from the right-hander, Gibbs gets beaten once again
full length on off stump, Gibbs waits for it and drives it late, he's placed it wide off Malik at mid-off and gets the single
pitches on off stump and angles away from Kallis who lets the ball go
that one pitched too wide outside off stump and went even wider, the umpire signals the second wide off the over
full ball on leg stump, Kallis flicks towards long leg where Shoaib is a touch slow  in getting to the ball, the batsmen run an easy two

short of a length on off stump, Gibbs waits on the back foot and punches the ball towards Malik's left at mid-off, Malik runs quickly and manages to pick up the ball but somehow kicks the ball further away
defended off the back foot towards cover, Shoaib is keeping the batsmen firmly on the back foot with his length

dropped, Akmal drops an absolute sitter, this one was a touch fuller, it pitched on a good length and drew Kallis forward, the ball kissed the outside edge and flew at an easy height straight to Akmal who couldn't take it cleanly, Kallis has had a poor ODI series so far and Pakistan could have had him cheaply once again
defended on the back foot towards the off side
short of a length once again, Kallis waits on the back foot and defends
Shoaib ends the over with a sharp bouncer outside off stump, Kallis swerves out of the way
full ball on middle and off stump, Gibbs leans forward and drives towards cover
outstanding shot, Gibbs takes advantage off the full length and drives on the up through extra cover for his second boundary of the innings
on the fuller side once more, Gibbs moves forward and drives to cover
slightly shorter in length, the ball pitches on middle stump and angles across Gibbs who defends on the front foot
too wide outside off stump, Gibbs stands tall and hammers the ball through cover point with a majestic square drive
Tanvir gets one to bend back into the right-hander from off and middle stump, Gibbs flicks towards midwicket
Akhtar begins his third over with a wide
short of a length outside the off stump, Kallis moves on to the front foot and lets it go
Shoaib strays in line this time, slips down leg side, Kallis flicks off his pads towards long leg
a fantastic slower ball, it looked like it was going to be a beamer but the ball dipped sharply on Gibbs who defended it on the back foot, superb change of pace
short of a length outside off stump, Gibbs drives and gets an outside edge down to third man
short of a length outside off once again, the ball bounces sharply on Kallis who tries to drive off the back foot but gets an outside edge to third man
fuller length on off and middle stump, Gibbs leans across and drives the ball towards mid-on
Tanvir pitches on a good length on middle stump and seams it across Kallis who shoulders arms
full delivery on off stump, Kallis punches it straight past the bowler for a single
that's a shocking wide outside off stump, Gibbs had given Tanvir the charge but he had no hope in making contact
he re-adjusts and bowls a slower ball on leg and middle the line is better but Tanvir had over-stepped, Gibbs will have his third free-hit off the innings, can he make it count this time?
he does! Gibbs moves his front foot out of the way to make room and pulls the slower ball through square leg for four
good length on middle and off stump, Gibbs waits on the back foot and defends
good length delivery on off stump, Gibbs defends watchfully towards the off side
Tanvir ends a poor over with a dot ball, Pakistan need to bring more discipline into their bowling
the bouncer banged in short outside the off stump, Kallis lets it go through to Akmal
fuller length outside the off stump, Shoaib is bowling around 143 kmh, Kallis lets it go once again
good length delivery on off stump angling into the right-hander, Kallis moves on to the front foot and defends towards cover
poor line, Shoaib feeds Kallis on his pads and gets flicked away to the long-leg boundary, Kallis timed that splendidly
that was wide outside off stump, Kallis seemed to decide to play the cover drive at the last minute and hit it with the bottom of the bat
Shoaib bowls it a little shorter and Kallis tries to pull, he gets beaten by the pace and the ball passes over middle stump
Tanvir pitches on leg and middle, Gibbs moves across and flicks towards midwicket
down leg side once again and Gibbs cashes in on the indiscipline by nudging it down to the fine-leg boundary
defended towards short mid-wicket on the front foot
terrible line from Tanvir, he continues to bowl on leg stump and once again Gibbs collects four by glancing it down to fine leg
fuller ball and the line is much straighter from round the wicket, Gibbs strides forward and drives but gets an inside edge on to the front pad
Gibbs moves on to the front foot and defends towards midwicket
begins with a good length ball on off and middle stump, Kallis defends on the front foot, Bowden walks down to inspect Rao's follow through
excellent length outside off stump, Kallis tries to drive on the up but gets beaten
the length was too full to be playing back to and Kallis barely managed to bring his bat down in time and defend the ball towards point
Kallis steps down the pitch and drives on the up to mid-off
a touch wide outside off stump, Kallis plays it down to third man for  a single
Rao finishes an excellent first over by beating Gibbs outside the off stump.
defended towards the leg side on the back foot
Tanvir is angling it sharply into the right-hander from round the wicket, Kallis waits on the back foot and defends
Kallis moves towards the off stump to create the angle which allows him to flick down to long leg
Gibbs walks down the pitch to a short-of-a-length delivery and hits it with a flat bat straight back at Tanvir who barely managed to move out of the way, the ball races to the straight boundary
defended back to the bowler off the front foot
full ball angling into Gibbs who stays in his crease and gets an inside edge that runs past Akmal
Rao angles the ball towards middle and leg, Kallis flicks through midwicket
pitches on a good length outside off stump, the ball cuts back into Gibbs who tries to defend off the front foot but gets an inside edge past the stumps

Gibbs moves across his stumps and tries to play the slog sweep, the ball hits him high on the pad and rolls towards short leg, Kallis calls him through for  a single, Gibbs is late in reacting and had Akmal hit at the non-striker's end, it could have been tight
played through square leg for a single
full delivery on middle stump, Gibbs leans across and flicks towards deep square leg for one more
Rao ends the over with a slower full toss which Kallis drives back at him
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Gibbs defends to the leg side and Kallis sets off for a risky single, Gibbs sent him back and had Malik hit the stumps at the non-strikers end, Kallis would have been out
Afridi drags the ball short and Gibbs has ample time to pull the ball over midwicket for four more
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
full delivery on middle and leg stump, Gibbs flicks to long leg for a single
Kallis moves forward and tries to defend but gets beaten by the turn away from him
good length ball on off stump, defended off the front foot towards cover
Gibbs comes down the pitch and tries to pull Rao over midwicket, the length isn't short enough and Gibbs gets beaten
short of a length on middle stump, Gibbs nudges it off his hips through midwicket
superb placement, Kallis moves on to the front foot and plays the drive late, he hits the ball between cover and point, Afridi gives chase and saves one run
Gibbs collects another single with a flick off the pads to deep square leg
Rao ends the over with a well-directed slower ball on off stump, Kallis gets forward and defends solidly
tossed up on off stump, Gibbs defends on the front foot
bowled flatter and quicker outside the off stump, Gibbs lets it go through to Akmal
a bit too straight from Afridi, Gibbs flicks behind square for one
pitches on off and middle and, instead of the legspinner, the wrong un angles into Kallis and hits him on the pad, Afridi appeals for lbw but it was missing leg
defended back to the bowler, tight line and length from Afridi
defended on the front foot towards the off side
good length delivery angling into Gibbs from over the wicket, he moves on to the front foot and drives towards mid-on for  a single
far too short from Rao, Kallis had enough time to play two pull shots if he wanted, he rocks back on to the back foot and powers it through midwicket
short of a length once again, played to midwicket off the back foot
good length delivery outside off, Kallis opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
straighter line on middle stump, Gibbs comes forward and closes the face of the bat to play the ball towards midwicket
Gibbs moves across his stumps and flicks from off and middle through midwicket
Afridi gets one to bounce and turn sharply from off stump, Kallis gets beaten on the front foot defence
fuller ball on off  and middle stump, defended back to Afridi
Kallis defends towards cover on the front foot
Kallis gets off strike by pushing the ball through point
fuller ball on middle stump, Gibbs tries to flick but gets hit on the pad
Afridi pitches on middle stump and spins the ball across Gibbs, squaring him up a touch, he defends on the back foot
good length delivery angling into the right-hander, defended on the front foot
fuller delivery on middle stump, flicked towards deep backward square leg for a single
slower delivery on off stump, Gibbs moves forward and drives to mid-off
Gibbs moves across his stumps and, with a whip of his wrists, flicks the ball from off and middle towards long leg
Kallis moves towards the off side and defends solidly, with bat close to pad
Kallis pushes a good length ball from off and middle stump towards midwicket for a single
Afridi flights the ball outside off stump and offers Gibbs a little too much width, Gibbs launches it over extra cover for four
an action replay of the previous shot, Gibbs reaches fifty by lofting another one over extra cover, it's been a superb innings on a supposedly difficult pitch
driven to long-off for  a single
defended on the front foot towards the off side
bowled flat and fast outside off stump, Kallis lets it go
a flighted delivery drifts into Kallis from off stump, he gets on to the front foot and drives through cover for a single
short and wide outside off stump, Kallis waits on the back foot and smashes the ball straight to the fielder at cover
good length delivery on off stump, Kallis moves across and defends to midwicket
Rao pitches outside off stump and cuts the ball back into Kallis who opens the face of the bat and plays the ball towards point, Nazir charges in but can't prevent the single
Gibbs stands on the back foot and drives on the up back to the bowler, Bowden has another look at Rao's follow through and gives him a warning
flicked off the pads towards midwicket

bowled him! Rao pitches on off stump and seams the ball into Gibbs who tries to flick across the line without moving his feet much, he misses it completely and Rao uproots middle stump, he is ecstatic and that is a huge wicket for Pakistan for Gibbs was in dangerous form
driven off the front foot to deep cover for a single
bowled flat and fast on off and middle stump, driven off the back foot towards mid on
tight line and length around off stump, de Villiers defends to the off side
defended on the front foot towards cover
Afridi finishes a tight over with a good length delivery on off stump, de Villiers pushes it towards cover off the front foot
Rao strays on to leg stump, flicked off the pads through square leg for a single
fuller delivery outside off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
slower ball bowled full on off and middle stump, de Villiers nudges it towards mid-on
defended on the back foot towards cover for a sharp single
Kallis moves across his stumps and flicks the ball from off and middle towards deep square leg
short of a length on off stump, de Villiers stands on the back foot and drives towards mid-off
Afridi gives the batsman too much width outside off stump, de Villiers gets down on one knee and flays the ball through extra cover for four
driven through covers once more, for a single this time
played off the back foot through point for a single
bowled straighter and quicker on middle stump, flicked behind square for a single
Afridi tosses one up outside off stump, Kallis tries to cover drive but gets beaten
driven off the front foot towards extra cover
short of a length on off stump, Kallis opens the face of the bat and angles the ball towards point
full toss outside off stump, Kallis backs away and tries to smash it through the off side but mis-hits it towards mid-off
fuller length delivery angling into the pads, Kallis flicks off the front foot through midwicket
over-pitched outside the off stump, a rank half-volley which Kallis can't put away, he drives it firmly but straight to the fielder at cover
short of a length delivery pitches outside off stump and angles into Kallis who plays it with soft hands towards point for  a single
that's the first yorker we've seen today, Shoaib bowls it perfectly into the blockhole on middle stump, de Villiers manages to dig it out
short of a length outside off stump, de Villiers drives off the front foot to cover
beats de Villiers with his first ball and Akmal whips off the bails, de Villiers was just back in his crease
driven through covers for  a single
Kallis lunges forward and drives to point
Kallis tries to play the slog sweep against the spin and top-edges it, the ball falls safely in the vacant square leg region, Kallis was very lucky there
Kallis drives to cover off the front foot
tossed up on off stump, nice drift into the right-hander from Rehman, Kallis defends towards the off side
full delivery outside off stump which swings back into the right-hander, de Villiers strides forward and drives towards cover
what an excellent shot, the length wasn't short at all from Shoaib, de Villiers latched on to it in a flash and pulled it in front of midwicket for four
short and wide outside the off stump, de Villiers tries to cut it too hard and gets a bottom edge towards point
full and wide outside off stump, Kallis lunges at it and tries to drive, he gets an outside edge down to third man
the slower ball outside off stump, it's a bit too wide and de Villiers waits for it and drives to deep cover for  a single
short of a length and wide outside off stump, Kallis gets on to the front foot and plays an elegant drive through cover

and he strikes off the first ball! tossed up on off and middle, de Villiers steps down the track, gets on his knee and lofts with the spin. He doesn't get the desired elevation and Imran Nazir takes it easily at deep square-leg
fighted on middle and leg, nudged away to the on side
hardly any pace on that, defended to the off side
tossed up slowly on middle and leg, turned past the region of forward short-leg
glanced down to fine leg for a single
flighted on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
loops in the air from outside off, defended back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, gets on his knees and sweeps
flighted on middle, pushed back to the bowler
gets on his knee and sweeps to fine leg
bowls round the wicket, Kallis defends with an angled bat and the ball rolls to point. They turn down the single
tucked to the on side
flighted way down leg, Malik loses his direction, swept fine for a boundary
flighted on leg, pushed back to Malik
tossed up outside off, gets forward and pushes past the covers
turned towards midwicket, he turns down a single
pushed past point with an angled bat, easy single taken
flighted on leg, pushed back to the bowler
tossed on middle and leg, tucked wide of midwicket
gives it a lot of air, turns into a low full toss, pushed to long off
gets down to defend and gets a thickish outside edge to short third-man
pushed wide of midwicket for a single
bit of width outside off, cut wide of point
tucked off the pads behind the wicket
gets forward, sticks his bat out aiming to find the gap past point, ends up hitting to the fielder
turned to the on side
flighted on leg, pushed to long-on
flighted on off and middle, pushed to long-off
played back to the bowler
defended towards short third man off the back foot
Duminy moves forward to a full ball and nudges it towards midwicket for one
lovely delivery, pitches on off stump and turns away from Kallis, beating the outside edge of his drive
driven through midwicket for a single
bowled flat and quick on off and middle stump, defended towards midwicket
Duminy pushes the ball towards cover for a quick leg bye
flighted delivery angling into the left-hander from round the wicket, driven through midwicket off the front foot
Kallis reaches forward and pushes the ball with an open face past backward point
Duminy gets on to the front foot and defend to point
Duminy tries to guide the ball down to third man but gets beaten
driven wide of the fielder at long-on for two more
tossed up on middle and off stump, Duminy plays it late and cuts towards point
Kallis moves across his stumps and closes the face, trying the force it through midwicket, the ball spins across him, hits the leading edge and falls safely towards cover point
played off the back foot through square leg for a single
Kallis leans forward and pushes the ball to midwicket to move on to 49
Duminy gets a long stride in and defends on off stump
defended on the off side off the front foot
bowled flat and fast on off and middle stump, Duminy gets forward and pushes the ball to midwicket
Kallis drives the ball through point to bring up his fifty, it's been a battling innings, he's had a few let offs but he's fought on and played a valuable innings
defended off the front foot towards point
Malik strays down leg side, Duminy tries to flick but misses
down leg side once again but this time Duminy connects with the slog sweep
Kallis pushes the ball off the front foot through cover
pitches on off stump and spins away from Duminy who waits on the back foot and cuts through point
Kallis plays the ball with soft hands towards cover for a quick single
flighted delivery on off and middle stump, Kallis gets forward and drives through cover point
defended on the front foot towards point
Kallis leans forward and closes the face of the bat to play the ball through midwicket
Duminy moves outside the off stump and tries to sweep, he misses and gets hit on the pad
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
bowled flat from over the wicket, angling into the left-hander, Duminy defends towards midwicket
pushed off the pads through midwicket for  one more
bowled flatter through the air on middle stump, Duminy goes back in his crease and defends
Afridi drifts down leg side, Duminy sweeps and gets a tickle down to the fine leg boundary
wide outside the off stump, Duminy cuts to short third man
defended back to the bowler
Duminy comes forward and defends towards midwicket
Duminy moves across his stumps and tries to sweep but misses
once again he tries to sweep but doesn't connect
defended on the back foot towards the leg side
strays down leg side, wide called
driven towards mid on for  a single
Kallis tries to work it through the leg side but gets hit on the pad
Duminy goes back in his crease and works the ball off his pads for a single
Kallis tries to drive through cover but gets an outside edge to short third man
driven back to the bowler off the front foot
Kallis gets a single by driving through cover off the front foot
defended to cover off the front foot
Kallis drops the ball with soft hands towards cover and wants the single, Duminy sends him back
Duminy nudges one from off stump towards midwicket and strolls the single
full delivery angling into the right-hander, pushed through covers for a single
full and wide outside the off stump, Duminy tries to cut and gets beaten
Duminy drives off the back foot through point for a single
Rehman angles one into the pads, Kallis tries to sweep and misses
Kallis drives off the back foot through cover for one more
Kallis punches off the back foot through cover for  a single
Afridi strays down leg side, Duminy moves across his stumps and sweeps past short fine leg for four more
Afridi fires it quickly outside off stump, Duminy tries to drive off the back foot and gets beaten
driven off the back foot through cover
Kallis once again gets beaten on the drive, he's not looked at ease at all during this innings
and again, Kallis tries to drive a full ball through cover and is beaten
tossed up on off stump, Duminy moves back in his crease and defends towards mid-on
Duminy drives towards long-on and runs the single
Kallis gets down on one knee and sweeps Rehman from middle stump through square leg
Duminy waits on the back foot and cuts wide of the fielder at short third man
now how did that miss? Kallis tries to work the ball through midwicket, the ball hit the inside edge, ricocheted on to the pad, missed the stumps and well wide of Akmal
Duminy gets beaten outside the off stump of the final ball of the over
Kallis nudges the ball towards cover point for  a single
Duminy moves towards the off side and flicks the ball to short fine leg
flicked off the pads through square leg for one more
Kallis backs away and tries to loft over extra cover, he gets an outside edge which falls safely in front of short fine leg, Kallis has led a charmed life today
Duminy tries to defend but gets hit on the pad, Afridi appeals for leg before but the ball pitched outside leg
tossed up on middle stump, Kallis sweeps to deep square leg for one
tight line and length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
that's the first six of the innings, Duminy comes down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball, and lofts cleanly over deep midwicket, it's been a long time coming
nudged off the pads behind square for a single
Kallis backs away towards leg, looking for the drive through extra cover, he gets an inside edge on to the pad
Kallis gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep square leg

Akmal holds the steepler! Duminy comes down the track and tries to pull over midwicket, he gets a top edge that flies high in the air, Akmal runs forward and, though it wasn't the most reassuring take, he manages to hang on to it
driven off the front foot to long off for a single
short of a length outside the off stump, Boucher drives off the back foot through point
full toss on off stump, Kallis pushes the ball towards mid-on and sets off for the single, there's a direct hit from Latif the sub at mid-on but Kallis was safe
Boucher tries to force a full delivery through midwicket, the ball nips back at him and beats the bat
another one swings back into Boucher from off stump, he tries to drive through the off side but gets a thick inside edge
a full ball swings into the right-hander, driven hard into the ground towards cover
massive amounts of reverse swing, Shoaib bowls a yorker on middle and leg stump, the reverse swing beats Boucher and he manages to get an inside edge to fine leg
Shoaib lets loose a full toss at 140 kmh, it swings back into Kallis who drives through cover for  a single
more reverse swing into the blockhole, Boucher was expecting it this time and squeezed it towards fine leg for two

caught! Shoaib drags the length a little shorter, Boucher was perhaps expecting a fuller ball, he tried to close the face of the bat and play the ball through midwicket but was early on the shot, the leading edge lobbed up tamely towards Malik at cover
full ball on off and middle stump, no reverse swing this time, Pollock gets off the mark with a push towards mid-on
a low full toss on middle stump, driven off the front foot to long on
Rao strays on to leg stump, Kallis flicks off his pads through square leg
full ball on middle stump, Pollock drives straight, too straight for the ball crashes into the stumps at the bowler's end

caught in the deep! Pollock steps down the track and lofts the ball down to long on where Tanvir settles under the catch on the boundary's edge, he takes the catch cleanly but his back foot is dangerously close to the rope, the umpire says it's a clean catch but eventually calls for the third umpire who also concurs, Pollock has to go but that was extremely close
driven down to long on for  a single
Rao ends the over with a yorker on off stump, Morkel digs it out towards point
full toss on leg stump, flicked awkwardly off the pads for  a single
full delivery angling into the left-hander from round the wicket, Morkel drives hard towards cover
full toss outside off stump, a real scoring chance but Morkel misses out by hitting it straight to Yousuf at cover
Shoaib bowls the slower ball but strays down leg side with fine leg in the circle, Morkel flicks but can't get past Tanvir at short fine leg
short of a length delivery pitches outside off and cuts back into Kallis who tries to drive powerfully through cover, he doesn't make proper contact and will have to settle for one
that's a rather high full toss angling into the left-hander, Morkel swings it over midwicket for two runs
Kallis' lucky run continues, he backs away and tries to pull a good length delivery, he gets an inside edge that just misses leg stump and runs to the boundary
what a shot! Kallis backs away once again and hammers Rao back over his head, he's hit that with awesome power and the ball sails over the boundary
driven through point for two more, Kallis has taken plenty from this over so far
Rao comes back well with a yorker on middle stump, Kallis keeps it out
full ball outside off stump, driven through covers
good length delivery on middle stump, Morkel pushes the ball towards mid off and keeps strike
the slower ball, 115 kmh, angles into Morkel who backs away towards leg and pushes the ball towards cover
full ball on off stump, Kallis makes room and drives the ball hard towards cover where Malik dives and makes a five save

caught and how! Kallis tries to hit Shoaib over mid-on but gets a top edge that swirls high in the air back over the bowler's head, Malik makes excellent ground, running from cover towards the region between mid off and mid on, and settles under the catch, he tumbles to the ground after taking it but manages to hold on, superb catch
Morkel tries to pull but gets cramped for room by the angle into him  and is beaten

he's cleaned him up! Shoaib picks up his fourth with a slower ball angled into leg stump, Morkel looks to heave over the leg side, misses, and hears the ball hitting leg stump, what a comeback it's been
he's tried his best with a superb yorker on off stump, Nel manages to keep it out and collects a single towards mid-on, Shoaib finishes with 4 for 43 off nine overs
full toss flicked through midwicket for  a single
slower ball angles into Botha from round the wicket, he misses the attempted hit through midwicket and gets hit high on the pad
forced through midwicket for  a single
Tanvir gets among the wickets! He pitches an excellent yorker on middle stump, cramping Botha for room, Botha tries to play across the line but the ball beats his defences and crashes into the stumps
he gets off the mark right away by lofting one over cover
Tanvir strays down leg side, Ntini flicks but can't beat Shoaib at short fine leg

inn2.comm: on target right away, a good length ball pitches on off stump and angles into Nazir who defends on the front foot
a touch too wide outside off stump, Nazir cuts down to third man for a single
good length once again on off stump, driven on the up towards cover
short of a length on off stump, Akmal moves back in his crease and defends
fuller ball on off and middle stump, Akmal gets behind the line and defends towards the leg side
excellent length from Pollock, keeping Akmal on the back foot, he drives on the up towards cover
short of a length delivery pitches outside off stump and angles into the right-hander, defended on the back foot
full delivery strays down leg side, that's the first extra of the innings
good length delivery on off stump, Nazir gets on to the front foot and defends towards cover
Ntini's length and line on off stump gives Nazir no room to work with, he defends on the off side
just a fraction short this time outside the off stump, Nazir waits on the back foot and drives through covers for the first boundary of the innings
this time it's too full and too straight, Nazir leans across and flicks the ball off his toes for another boundary
full ball on the pads once again, Nazir uses his wrists superbly to flick it behind square for the third boundary of the over
good length on off stump, Pollock lands it on the right spot and the batsman offers the full face and defends
it's Pollock's turn to suffer as Kamran Akmal picks a good length delivery from outside off and bisects the gap between midwicket and mid-on with a glorious flick of the wrists
good length outside off and shaping away just a touch, pushed to point
changes his line closer to middle, Akmal stays on the backfoot and punches to mid-on
good line and length on the stumps, cramps Akmal as he pushes it softly to mid-on
fuller in length, slightly slower, opens the face of the bat and pushes the ball to point
smashed! Ntini slips that full outside off and wide too. Nazir eases onto it on the frontfoot and smashes that forcefully past the diving mid-off
short of a length, comes in, Nazir was too early on the pull and meets the ball flush on the thigh
fuller in length, outside off and pushed to the covers
good length just outside off, gets a half stride forward and punches it firmly to short cover
shapes to cut, he meets the  ball off the toe edge and chops it down on the ground
Ntini comes back with a bang! good length on the corridor outside off, Nazir is cramped for room as he tries to cut. The ball gets a thick outside edge and flies to Boucher at waist-height
lands that on a good length outside off, sliced to cover
timing! just a hint of width outside off, Akmal rocks on the backfoot and punches off the meat of the bat past point
fuller and touch too wide, Akmal stretches out his bat and square drives past point. The ball was too quick for third man who was fielding quite square
better line and length on the stumps, pushed to mid-on
good length on middle and leg, tucked off the hips past midwicket
outside off and Younis decides to let it go
full ball and just a bit too straight, angling into middle stump, Akmal uses the angle to flick through midwicket, Nel gives chase and keeps the batsmen to two
too straight once again but this time Akmal can't find the gap in the infield, he flicks the ball off his pads to square leg
slightly shorter in length and the line is outside off stump, Akmal waits on the back foot and gently punches through extra cover, Smith gives chase this time and the batsmen run three
wide outside the off stump, Younis gets off the mark by opening the face and running the ball to third man
short of a length on off stump, Akmal punches with a straight bat past Ntini and runs the single
good length delivery pitches outside off stump and angles into Younis who defends on the back foot
pitches on a tight length on off stump, Akmal stays in his crease, with Boucher standing up to the stumps, and drives towards cover
fuller delivery angles into Akmal at 117 kmh, he gets forward and gets hit on the pad outside the line of off stump
a touch too straight this time, slanting into middle stump, Akmal closes the face to play the ball to midwicket
loud appeal for lbw for Younis had moved across his stumps a long way while trying to flick to flick, he got a bit of bat on to it before the ball hit the pad
punched off the bat foot towards cover point
defended on the off side off the front foot
pitches on a good length on off stump, Akmal stands tall on the back foot and drives to cover
super shot! Akmal moves back and across, picks up the length early, and drives with a straight bat past the bowler, he's timed that superbly and the ball speeds to the boundary

the middle stump goes for a walk! Ntini angles the ball into Akmal from wide of the crease, the ball was too full to pull and Akmal got a bottom edge which crashed into middle stump, a promising innings has been cut short by a rash shot
Ntini digs the ball in short of a length and angles it into Yousuf's ribs, he defends on the back foot
Yousuf moves on to the front foot and pushes a good length ball to cover
Pollock pitches on off stump and angles the ball into middle, Younis moves across his stumps and flicks to short fine leg
this time he places the flick in front of square and collects a single, Pollock's disciplined line is giving the batsman very little to work with

how did he survive that? There's a loud shout from Pollock and Boucher, the ball pitched outside off stump and cut back sharply into Yousuf, the ball passed through the gap between bat and pad and it may have taken an inside edge on the way through to Boucher, it nearly bowled him as well
defended towards the off side on the front foot
Yousuf gets forward and defends back to the bowler
Yousuf moves across his stumps and flicks towards midwicket
good length delivery outside off stump, Younis cuts towards point but doesn't time it well
excellent improvisation, the length from Ntini wasn't that short but Younis moved quickly towards the off side and flicked it off his hips through midwicket for four
defended on the front foot towards cover
Younis once again moves towards the off side and drives a full ball towards mid on
over-pitched delivery outside the off stump, Yousuf gets on to the front foot and drives to mid-off
short of a length delivery on middle stump, Yousuf flicks to midwicket and calls for a risky single
good length ball, Yousuf pats it back to the bowler
short of a length again, outside off, driven back to cover
Yousuf playing it cautiously here, driven back to mid-off
slower ball outside the off stump, Yousuf plays it late and opens the face to guide the ball to third man
Pollock strays a little too straight, Younis moves towards the off and flicks behind square for two more
Younis plays a well-timed cover drive to collect two more to end the over
starts with a good length ball on off stump which Yousuf defends towards cover point
short of a length outside the off stump, Yousuf waits on the back foot and drives on the up towards deep point
Younis moves forward to a full ball from Nel and drives towards mid-off

Nel bowls a slower ball outside the off stump, the length is just a little short, which  tempts Younis into playing the pull but he gets beaten by the change of pace and the ball passes under his bat, that one kept a touch low too
defended on the offside on the front foot
tight line and length on off stump, Younis plays the ball to point off the back foot
outstanding drive! Yousuf gets forward to a half-volley on off stump and places the  drive wide of Graeme Smith who makes a despairing drive at mid-off
better line and length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Morkel strays on to leg stump this time, Yousuf waits for it and, at the last moment, plays a wristy flick to send the ball speeding to the deep backward square leg boundary
pushed into the covers off the front foot for a single
better line and length from Morkel, on off stump, Younis gets on to the front foot and defends
a touch too wide outside off stump, Younis guide the ball wide of Nel at third man and gets two more
pitches on a good length outside off and angles into Yousuf who moves across his stumps and blocks

another one cuts back sharply into Yousuf who defends to the off side, Nel appeals because he thinks the ball brushed the pad before hitting the bat, he was right but the impact was outside the line of off stump
defended back to the bowler off the front foot
a touch short outside the off stump, Yousuf stands on the back foot and drives through point
Younis moves towards the off side and defends to cover
full ball on middle and leg stump, Younis drives off the front foot to mid on
Morkel pitches on off stump and angles the ball into Yousuf who defends towards mid on
full ball on middle stump, Yousuf drives towards mid-on, he hit that firmly but couldn't find the gap
that's poor from Morkel, you can't bowl a leg stump line at the best of times and certainly not when your fine leg is in the circle, Yousuf flicks it to the fine leg boundary
Yousuf pushes the ball to Smith at mid-off and runs an extremely risky single, had Smith hit at the bowler's end, Yousuf was a goner
Morkel strays down leg side once again, this time Younis misses the leg glance and gets hit on the pad for two leg byes towards fine leg
terrible stuff from Morkel, he's feeding the batsman on his pads and Younis accepts the offering gleefully by flicking to the square leg boundary
good length delivery on off stump, Yousuf strides forward and defends back to Nel

massive appeal for leg before, Nel bowls a full ball which pitches on off stump and darts back into Yousuf who had moved a fair way across his stumps, the ball struck him on the top of the pad so perhaps it was a touch too high
good length delivery on off stump, Yousuf leans forward and defends to cover
defended towards point off the back foot, Nel gives Yousuf a little stare on his follow through
good length delivery jags back into Yousuf who plays it very late and opens the face to run the ball to short third man
driven off the front foot towards cover where Botha dives and saves runs
he starts well with a good length delivery on off stump, Yousuf gets on to the front foot and defends back to Kallis
the slower ball pitches on a good length outside off stump, Yousuf spots the change in pace and defends towards cover

an excellent shot stopped by equally excellent fielding, Yousuf spotted another slower ball and played his cover drive late, he seemed to have pierced the infield at cover but JP Duminy dived to his left to save three runs
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Younis walks down the pitch, a little premeditated perhaps, and hammers the straight drive past Kallis for four, Kallis was lucky that didn't hit his shins
nudged towards midwicket for  a single to end the over
dug in short of a length outside off stump, the ball cuts into Younis off the pitch, he plays it late with an open face towards short third man
full ball on middle stump, Younis flicks and falls over a touch as he finished the shot, the ball bounces awkwardly in front of Gibbs but he manages to stick out his hand and stop it
Nel bowls it a little short but the ball hardly bounces, Yousuf gets under it but the ball was hardly a bouncer
this time it bounces higher and Yousuf pulls it to deep square leg
full and wide outside the off stump, Younis reaches out for it and drives towards point
excellent ball, Younis was playing for the seam movement into the right-hander but this one from Nel went straight through and beat the outside edge
full ball on off and middle stump, defended towards the off side
good length ball pitches on off stump and cuts back into Yousuf who defends on the back foot
Yousuf moves towards the off side and cuts a good length ball down to third man for a single
Kallis cuts down on the pace and bowls it at 116 kmh, Younis tries to run it to third man but was beaten by the slower ball
Younis tries to move across his stumps and loft the ball over mid-on but mis-timed the shot and hit it along the ground to the fielder at mid-on
nudged off the pads behind square for a single
defended back to the bowler off the back foot

huge appeal for lbw, Yousuf moves dangerously across his stumps and attempts to flick, he misses the ball and gets hit flush on the pad, that was very close, not much wrong with that, there were two noises but it was bat hitting pad and then ball hitting pad
driven off the front foot towards point
played with an open face towards backward point
Younis drives a low full toss straight back at the stumps at the bowler's end, Nel sticks out his boot and gets a touch on it, Yousuf had just got back before the ball hit the stumps
driven through midwicket for  a single to end the over
short of a length and slipping down the leg side, flick played and missed, called a wide anyhow
slower ball outside the off, too full and a bit too much width, eased nicely through cover, Graeme Smith has to give chase and dive on the ropes to stop this one from getting to the ropes
another slower ball, this one is better directed, the batsman just opens the face of the bat and runs the ball to third-man
good length and on the stumps, defended back down the pitch to the bowler
another one quite full and on the off, Younis jams the bat down and slides the ball away to the off side for a risk-free single
angled in onto the stumps, Yousuf defends to leg and thinks about a single, sauntering down the pitch but goes back in time
very full and very straight, flick played and missed, off the pads down to the leg side
full and on the off, Younis just waits on that one and drives through the line. It's uppish but the placement is superb and the ball races back down past the bowler for a four!
fuller and on the off, driven hard at, off a thickish edge down on the bounce to gully
short ball banged in this time, Younis watches the ball carefully and ducks under the ball
full and on the pads, driven hard and just wide of the man at mid-on
full and on the off, defended with bat and pad held close together
short of a good length and outside the off, just eased ever so gently through the cover but the timing is great, Shaun Pollock dives on the ropes and cleans up
starts by pitching one on middle stump and strays down leg side, Yousuf moves across his stumps and sweeps to fine leg
tossed up on off and middle stump, Younis leans across and nudges it towards midwicket
turned off the pads behind square for a single
flighted delivery outside the off stump, Yousuf gets on to the front foot and drives towards point
too straight from Botha this time, Younis flicks off his pads for a single
tossed up outside the off stump, Yousuf gets into position early to play the reverse sweep, waits until the ball reaches him and paddles it past the fielder at short third man
short and wide outside the off stump, that was a loose delivery but Younis hit it straight to the fielder at cover, he tried to hit it too hard and failed to place it properly
Younis walks across his stumps and flicks it from outside off stump through midwicket
once again he moves outside off stump, looking to flick through the leg side, Ntini replies by bowling it further outside off, Younis pushes at it and gets an outside edge to third man
driven off the front foot towards cover point
Ntini bangs it short and gets the ball to bounce sharply on Yousuf who did well to check his shot, the ball hits the outside edge and runs down to third man
Yousuf waits on the back foot for the ball to spin into him and nudges it down towards fine leg
Younis moves across his stumps and flicks towards midwicket
Younis gets down on one knee and sweeps uppishly through square leg
Yousuf leans on to the front foot and gets him on the pad outside the line of off stump
flighted delivery on off stump, Yousuf comes on to the front foot and pushes towards midwicket
Botha ends the over with the doosra which has Yousuf a little foxed, he ends up defending it awkwardly to the off side
Younis once again walks across his stumps and swats Ntini from wide outside the off stump past mid-on for a boundary, he didn't time it well but he hit it hard enough
Younis uses the width on offer to run the ball down to third man
Yousuf reaches out at a wide ball and drives through point for a single

Younis drops the ball with soft hands towards cover and sets off for a single, Yousuf wants nothing to do with it and sends Younis back, de Villiers sprints in from point and underarms the throw back at the stumps, had he hit Younis would have been out
excellent use of the feet, he moves towards the off side to negate the sharp angle into him and flicks wide of mid-on for four more, Duminy gives chase but the ball is timed too well for him
driven through extra cover and the single brings up Younis' fifty, he's played extremely well and given Pakistan a great chance to win the series
flicked off the back foot through midwicket for  a single
cut off the back foot through point for two more
tossed up on off and middle stump, defended on the back foot
defended towards the leg side on the front foot
Yousuf stretches forward and defends towards point
tossed up on middle stump, Yousuf leans forward and gets hit on the pad
good length delivery on off and middle stump, Younis flicks behind square for  a single
he bowls the offcutter on off and middle stump, Yousuf uses the turn into him and closes the face of the bat to play the ball through square leg
defended on the back foot towards cover
the slower ball bowled slightly short on middle stump, Yousuf moves across his stumps and pulls the ball towards long leg
another slower ball bowled dead straight, that was 102 kmh, Younis defends to the off side
Younis waits on the back foot and opens the face of the bat and gets a single to third man

loud appeal for lbw, Younis jumped outside the line of off stump and tried to heave it over the leg side, he missed and was struck in line off off stump, that was probably going on to hit middle and leg
driven to long on for  a single
driven through midwicket for  another single, the scoreboard is ticking along nicely
flicked through square leg for one more

Younis leaps down the track and even though he isn't to the pitch of the ball, he goes through with the shot and lofts the ball over midwicket, he's placement is impeccable and the ball bounces over the deep midwicket boundary
superb placement, Yousuf latches on to a fraction of width outsid ethe off stump, he waits on the back foot and cuts to the vacant sweeper boundary
driven to cover off the front foot
this time Yousuf tries to drive without moving his feet and gets beaten by the movement into him off the pitch
Yousuf turns the ball off his pads towards midwicket
slower ball on middle and leg stump, flicked off his pads down to fine leg

splendid catch at deep midwicket! The slower ball was short enough to pull and Younis made good contact, he timed it well but didn't get the necessary elevation to clear the boundary, Albie Morkel moved to his right and took a well-judged catch on the boundary, Younis goes after an aggressive half-century
flighted delivery outside the off stump, Yousuf gets to the pitch of the ball and plays a delightful cover drive for two more
Yousuf gets well forward and defends, the ball hits him on the pad but the impact was outside the line of off stump, which is why Botha's lbw appeal was not upheld
defended on the leg side off the front foot
once again Botha appeals for leg before but yet again the impact was outside off
driven off the front foot through midwicket
played towards short fine leg, Botha finishes a tight over
the slower ball outside off stump, Malik doesn't waste any time getting off the mark, he guides the ball towards third man for  a single
Yousuf also collects a single by running the ball to third man
a full ball swings into Malik who drives towards cover off the front foot
Pollock bowls a slower ball at 107 kmh on off stump, Malik moves on to the front foot and blocks
another slower ball, 103 kmh this time, Malik goes on to the back foot and drives through midwicket for  a single
Yousuf reaches his fifty - his fourth in the series - with a superb drive through extra cover, Smith gives up the chase at mid-off and leaves it for the man on the deep cover boundary
driven to mid-off for a single
tossed up on middle and leg stump, Yousuf leans across his stumps and tries to sweep but can't beat the man at short fine leg
driven through midwicket off the front foot for  a single
full ball on middle stump, Malik flicks it off his toes through midwicket for one more
tossed up on middle stump, Yousuf drives towards cover
Yousuf sweeps through square leg for  a single

he strikes with his first ball! It was a flighted delivery very wide outside off stump, it would have probably been called wide had Yousuf not reached out for it, he tried to play an expansive cover drive and got a nick through to Boucher
Misbah gets off the mark by moving across his stumps and nudging down to fine leg, an overthrow at the bowler's end allows the extra run
Misbah gets down on one knee and sweeps past the fielder at short leg
driven down to long on for a single
Malik moves towards the off side but the ball spins sharply into him after pitching on off stump and strikes him on the pad
full toss outside off stump driven to long on for  a single
pitches on a good length outside off stump and moves away from the right hander, Malik lets it go through to Boucher
chopped down to third man for a single
pitches wide outside off stump and moves further away from Misbah who doesn't play a shot, the umpire calls it wide
fuller and straighter from Morkel, Misbah pushes it off the front foot to mid-on
full and wide outside the off stump, Misbah reaches out for it and drives away from his body, aiming for the cover region, the outside edge runs down to third man
Malik drives off the front foot towards cover
a full length ball swings into Malik who drives through cover for a single
pitched short of a length on off stump, Malik drives off the back foot to cover
Nel keeps Malik on the back foot with his length, Malik opens the face to play the ball towards point
short ball angles into Malik's ribs, he jumps on to the back foot and blocks
short and wide outside the off stump, Malik jumps on to the back foot and slaps it through cover
good length delivery outside the off stump, Misbah lets it go through to Boucher
Misbah tries to run the ball down to third man even though there's a slip in place, the ball goes to first slip on the bounce
play and a miss that time, full and outside off, tame prod from Malik and he could have easily edged that. Surprisingly no slip in

on the shorter side and Malik has backed away and flayed it with the crispness of a crackle biscuit, de Villiers leaps for the catch at point and maybe got a finger-tip ti that one but he can't get there. He grimaces and Malik lets out a smile
too full, too straight  and that's a gorgeous drive from Malik. Morkel tries to stop his with his foot but that is fizzing past him. Mid-off is up and it's screamed past for four more. On a roll
patted back down the ground. Mixing caution with aggression here
worked away to the on side, easily done
defended on the back foot

that's luck for you, full and outside off, Misbah pushes and the thick edge flies away between the keeper and the wide slip for four. That was a lame push from Misbah and the field position was off the mark. Smith looks up to the heavens
otoo way outside off, marginal one that but it's probably harsh calling that one a wide
easily done, worked away to midwicket for a couple, can't bowl down that line and expect to restrict these batsmen
short of a length that time, rising all the time and Misbah lets it go.
tapped to the off side for a single, away from the body and finds the gap
good line that time, just outside off and jagging back in a bit, inside edge trickles away to the leg side
wide again, too far outside off and moving away, left alone that time.
driven to covers for an easy single, easy pickings these
full delivery outside the off stump swings away from Misbah who tries to drive through cover but gets beaten
a touch too straight this time, on middle stump, Misbah flicks through midwicket for a single
short of a length outside the off stump, Malik stands on the back foot and drives past point, Pollock runs to his right on the sweeper boundary and mops up
defended towards the off side on the back foot
pitches wide outside the off stump and cuts back into Malik who moves on to the front foot and lets the ball go
short of  a length outside off, this one keeps a touch low and Malik gets beaten on the cut
good length delivery in the channel outside off stump, Misbah drives off the back foot but can't beat the infield
short of a length on middle stump, Misbah nudges it towards the vacant midwicket region and Nel charges off to do the fielding himself
short of a length delivery jags back into Malik who defends off the back foot
full toss outside the off stump, Malik steps forward and drives to mid-off
Nel tries to do something funny with his action, twirling his hand high in the air, he bowls an over-pitched delivery on middle and leg stump which Malik drives firmly to the long-on boundary
defended towards the offside off the back foot
excellent ball, it pitched on middle and seamed away just a fraction off the pitch, Misbah got squared up and the ball beat the outside edge
pushed off the back foot towards point, he's placed that wide of the fielder and collects a single
bowled him! Morkel bowls a full ball which swings sharply into Malik from outside off stump, Malik tries to drive through cover and gets an inside edge on to middle stump, uprooting it from the soil

massive appeal for caught behind first up, Morkel pitches the short ball outside off stump and takes Afridi completely by surprise, the ball bounces sharply and Afridi tries to fend it away, he might have got a nick through to Boucher, the South Africans were convinced, the umpire wasn't
Afridi tries to drive through the off side and gets beaten
wide outside the off stump, this time Afridi decides to let it go through to Boucher
Misbah gets forward to one that angles into him from outside off stump and defends towards cover
tight line and length, angling into off stump from just outside, Misbah gets on to the front foot and pushes the ball towards cover point
defended towards cover once again, Nel is bowling a tight over so far, no antics with his action this time
Nel gets one to bounce sharply off a good length, Misbah tries to cut off the back foot but gets beaten
good length delivery jags back into Misbah from outside off stump, he defends back to the bowler
Nel completes the first maiden over of the innings, the last ball is bowled in the channel outside off stump and Misbah lets it go through to Boucher
Afridi moves forward to a full ball and drives through cover for a single, Pakistan bring up their 200
Misbah gets forward and drives hard towards cover where Duminy moves quickly to his left and stops the ball
Misbah hangs his bat out at one that pitches outside the off stump and moves away from him, the ball beats the outside edge, totally unnecessary shot from Pakistan's point of view
driven off the front foot to mid-off
Morkel bowls a full delivery outside off, the ball swings away from Misbah who does well to move towards the ball and drive through cover
Morkel appeals for leg before but the impact was outside the line of off stump
short of a length outside the off stump, Afridi waits on the back foot and pushes the ball towards cover
he's clobbered that! Afridi latches on to a short ball and pulls it a massive distance over the midwicket boundary, that will certainly ease some of the pressure
driven firmly off the front foot to Smith at mid off
Afridi walks towards the off side and flicks the ball through square leg for  a single

well caught! Misbah tries to loft one over cover but that's a difficult shot to play against Ntini, who angles it into the right-hander from wide of the crease, he mis-hits it high in the air over cover point, Duminy runs backwards and takes a well-judged catch, South Africa have given themselves an outside chance
Afridi tries to hit that into orbit, he gave that a massive heave, missed, and nearly lost off stump

he's got him! Morkel bowls a quick full ball which swings back into Tanvir and strikes him full on the boot, that was going on to hit middle and leg, the umpire raises the finger quickly and sends Tanvir on his way
full delivery on off stump, driven off the front foot towards extra cover
good length delivery pitching on middle stump and angling across Rehman who moves across his stumps and nudges it to the leg side
Morkel switches off his radar and bowls a very wide ball down leg side, he was probably looking for the yorker but got it terribly wrong
Morkel bowls this much closer to leg stump, it just misses Rehman's back boot and goes through to Boucher, that's an other wide
full toss outside off stump, Rehman pushes it to long off for  a single
Afridi gets squared up by one that pitches on middle and straightens, he gets an outside edge to third man for a single
cut past point off the back foot for a single to keep strike
full ball outside off stump, Rehman tries to run it down to third man but gets beaten by the angle across him
width offered outside off stump, it was too full as well and Rehman laced it through point for an invaluable four
driven through covers for  a single

what a catch! Afridi throws his bat at one on off stump, he was trying to hit that down the ground but got a thick top edge, the ball was flying towards the region between backward point and third man and it looked like it was falling safe, de Villiers sprinted back from point, covered plenty of ground and judged the catch to perfection, in fact he took that while he was running at full speed and tumbled as he took it, simply outstanding

another ones goes! Rao Iftikhar drives at one that swings away from him and gets an outside edge through to Boucher, the ball flies low and to his right and Boucher dives to pull off a sharp catch inches from the ground

that's it, South Africa have won! What an amazing turnaround it's been, Shoaib Akhtar throws his bat at the first ball he faces and lofts the ball high  in the air to Nel on the sweeper boundary, he settles under the catch and takes it easily, the South Africans rush to the middle to celebrate a superb victory
